import React from 'react' import './signup.css' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup' import { userSignUpSchema } from '../../validation/formValidation' import axios from '../../axios' function SignUp() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(userSignUpSchema) }) const signUpSubmit = (data) => { delete data.ConfirmPassword; console.log(data); axios.post('/users/signup',data).then((response)=>{ console.log(response); }).catch(()=>{ }) } return (
